Uses of Class
Map

    • Uses of Map in <Unnamed>

      Constructors in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Map 
      Constructor and Description
      Boss(Map map)
      Class constructor to initiate boss's basic information, e.g.
      Bullet(Map map)
      Class constructor to create a bullet on the map.
      Character(Map map)
      Class constructor to create a character on the map of the game.
      Coin(Map map)
      Class constructor initializes width, height, image, animation for a mushroom with a map instance to reveal specified location on the map.
      EatPeopleFlower(Map map)
      Class constructor initializes width, height, damage, image, animation for a flower with a map instance to reveal specified location on the map.
      Enemy(Map map)
      Class constructor initializes all useful information for an enemy with a map instance to reveal specified location on the map.
      FireBall(Map map, boolean right)
      Class constructor declare all detail information(width, height, collision width, collision height, damage value, direction, image, animation of the fire ball.
      FireBomb(Map map, boolean right)
      Class constructor declare all detail information(width, height, collision width, collision height, damage value, direction, image, animation of the fire bomb.
      GameObject(Map map)
      Class constructor needs map instance for allocate game object into suitable coordinate.
      Mushroom(Map map)
      Class constructor initializes width, height, damage, image, animation for a mushroom with a map instance to reveal specified location on the map.
      Player(Map map)
      Class constructor initializes width, height, hp, fireball amount, attack damage, image, animation with a map instance to reveal specified location on the map.
